cards.title: Deeproot
setup: {DeeprootTeam} starts the game 'Overgrown Menace' side up.
Put Plant Life of the Party into play and the villain deck is shuffled.
gameplay: At the end of {DeeprootTeam}'s turn, the 2 Villain or Environment Targets with the lowest HP gain 2 HP.
Then {DeeprootTeam} deals the X Hero Targets with the highest HP 2 Toxic Damage each where X is equal to the number of Plant Growth Cards in play.
cards.advanced: The first time each turn a Villain Ongoing or Plant Growth enters play, {DeeprootTeam} gains 2 HP.
flippedGameplay: Reduce Damage dealt to Environment Targets by 1. At the start of {DeeprootTeam}'s turn, play the top card of the Environment deck.
cards.challengeText: Villain Character Cards are Immune to Damage from environment cards

openingLines.DaybreakMuertoCharacter: Deeproot to Daybreak Muerto placeholder opening!

cards.title: Plant Life of the Party
body: Reduce Non-Fire Damage dealt to {DeeprootTeam} by 1.
Increase Fire Damage dealt to {DeeprootTeam} by 1.
At the end of {DeeprootTeam}'s turn, he gains 1 HP for each Plant Growth Card in play.
{DeeprootTeam} is immune to Damage from Environment Cards.

cards.title: Bark Shield
body: Play this card next to the Villain character card with the lowest HP.
Reduce non-fire Damage to all Villain Targets in that Villain’s play area by 2.

cards.title: Writhing Flora
body: Reduce Damage dealt by Hero Targets by 1.
When this card is destroyed shuffle {DeeprootTeam}'s Trash into his deck.

cards.title: Deep Roots
body: Reduce damage dealt to Environment Targets by 1.
Increase damage from Environment Cards to Hero Targets by 1.

cards.title: Wild Growth
body: Shuffle {DeeprootTeam}'s trash into his deck.
Reveal the top {H} card of {DeeprootTeam}'s deck. Put any Plant Growth Cards into Play. Discard all other cards. {DeeprootTeam} gains 2 HP for each card discarded this way.

cards.title: Stranglevines
body: Play this card next to the Hero Character with the highest HP. Redirect all damage that target would deal to non-Hero targets to {DeeprootTeam}.
At the Start of {DeeprootTeam}'s Turn, this Card deals the Hero Character it is next to 2 Melee and 2 Toxic Damage.

cards.title: Can't Stop the Beatdown
body: {DeeprootTeam} Deals the Hero Target with the second highest HP 4 Melee Damage. Redirect the next damage that Target would deal to {DeeprootTeam} and reduce it by 2.

cards.title: Photosynthestrike
body: {DeeprootTeam} deals the Hero Target with the Highest HP X+1 toxic Damage, where X equals the number of Environment Cards in play.

cards.title: Wildbond
body: Each time an Environment Card enters play, {DeeprootTeam} gains 2 HP and deals the Hero Target with the highest HP 3 Melee Damage.
Each time an Environment Card is Destroyed, {DeeprootTeam} deals the Hero Target with the Lowest HP 2 Toxic Damage.

cards.title: Thornwhips
body: At the End of {DeeprootTeam}’s Turn he deals the X + 1 Hero Targets with the highest HP 2 Melee Damage each, where X is equal to the number of Environment Cards in Play.

cards.title: Healing Salve
body: Increase HP Recovery by Non-Hero Targets by 1.
At the End of {DeeprootTeam}’s Turn, all Non-Hero Targets gain 1 HP.
